attractions.name: Holambra Flower Park
attractions.description: Beautiful park showcasing millions of flowers with Dutch-inspired gardens and architecture.

attractions.name: Moinho Povos Unidos
attractions.description: A replica of traditional Dutch windmills, symbolizing the Dutch heritage of Holambra.

attractions.name: Holambra Expoflora
attractions.description: Annual flower festival that celebrates Dutch culture with flowers, dances, and food.

attractions.name: Dutch Village
attractions.description: Charming area with Dutch-style buildings housing shops, restaurants, and museums.

attractions.name: Flower Auction
attractions.description: One of Brazil's largest flower auctions where you can see the flower trade in action.

attractions.name: St. Nicholas Church
attractions.description: Beautiful church with Dutch architectural influences in the heart of Holambra.

attractions.name: Holambra Cheese Factory
attractions.description: Learn about Dutch-style cheese production and sample delicious local cheeses.

attractions.name: Bike Trail Network
attractions.description: Over 20km of scenic bike trails connecting parks, farms, and attractions.
